javascript: Compiling ES6 to globaly supported JavaScript and optimizing it.
See BabelJS homepage for an in depth explanation.
typescript: Compiling JS written in safer JS with more advanced syntax to globally supported JavaScript.
See TypeScript homepage for an in depth explanation.
typescriptx: Compiling JS wiht React written in safer JS with more advanced syntax to globally supported JavaScript.
See TypeScript (JSX) homepage for an in depth explanation.
sass: Compiling CSS written in SASS or SCSS style to globally supported CSS.
See SASS homepage for an in depth explanation.
less: Compiling CSS written in LESS style to globally supported CSS.
See LESS homepage for an in depth explanation.
jade: Compiling HTML written in JADE (old version of PUG) to globally supported HTML.
See JADE homepage for an in depth explanation.
pug: Compiling HTML written in PUG (new version of JADE) to globally supported HTML.
See PUG homepage for an in depth explanation.
